name: Close Fight
description:
Close Fight is a representative of the almost forgotten game genre. 
Games that allow you to compete on one computer, on one keyboard...

Invite your friend and beat him in Close Fight!

CONTROLS:
Player 1: WASD + Left Ctrl (attack)
Player 2: Arrows + Space (attack)

NOTE: It's a very first version of game, so any ideas and suggestions are welcome.
